retrofit2.mock

Class Calls

  • java.lang.Object
    • retrofit2.mock.Calls

  • public final class Calls
extends Object
    Factory methods for creating Call instances which immediately respond or fail.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static <T> Call<T> defer(Callable<Call<T>> callable)
      Invokes callable once for the returned Call and once for each instance that is obtained from cloning the returned Call.
      static <T> Call<T> failure(IOException failure)
      Creates a failed Call from failure.
      static <T> Call<T> failure(Throwable failure)
      Creates a failed Call from failure.
      static <T> Call<T> response(Response<T> response) 
      static <T> Call<T> response(T successValue) 

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • defer

        public static <T> Call<T> defer(Callable<Call<T>> callable)
        Invokes callable once for the returned Call and once for each instance that is obtained from cloning the returned Call.

      • response

        public static <T> Call<T> response(@Nullable
                                   T successValue)

      • response

        public static <T> Call<T> response(Response<T> response)

      • failure

        public static <T> Call<T> failure(IOException failure)
        Creates a failed Call from failure.

      • failure

        public static <T> Call<T> failure(Throwable failure)
        Creates a failed Call from failure.

        Note: When invoking execute() on the returned Call, if failure is a RuntimeException, Error, or IOException subtype it is thrown directly. Otherwise it is "sneaky thrown" despite not being declared.
